name: Panique à Temple A-Steak
description:
• A two-player cooperative game with asymmetric difficulty.
Both casual and regular players can enjoy the same game!

  • A crazy adventure worthy of the biggest blockbusters.
Both explosive experiences fans and visual novels fans can live a fantastic epic story together!

  • A short game to savor in one run.
Turn your movie/series night into a video game experience to enjoy with a friend!

Platform : PC Windows

Number of players : 2 (local only - or Steam Remote Play)

Controller :

Player 1 (regular): keyboard only

Player 2 (casual): mouse only

Compatible with Steam Remote Play!!!!

Language : French voices / French or English subtitles
